Text.content:
For each resource type in OpenCms, you basically need three different localized values:

  • Title (shown in workplace and ADE add wizard)
  • Description (shown in workplace and ADE add wizard)
  • Title for the "New" dialog of the traditional workplace shown when adding a new content of the type

The keys for these values have to be placed in workplace message bundles. Bundles ending with .workplace and property files name messages are treated special in OpenCms. They are called worplace message bundles. They conform to the following name scheme:
